nodes.text: The Alsakan Mosaics were tile mosaics found in the city of Rucapar on the planet Alsakan. The center of the mosaic was at the city square and extended as five lanes of tile to five equidistant mountains. Most of the original mosaic was destroyed during the Third Alsakan Conflict, and only remnants survived. However, it was included in the Twenty Wonders of the Galaxy by Vicendi in 10,000 BBY.
